mapper.sql: FUND_ID, PERIOD, TRANSACTION_DATE, CURRENCY, EY_BUYSELL_TYPE, EY_STOCKBOND_TYPE, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, QUANTITY, AMOUNT, SEAT_COMMISSION, STAMPS, BROKERAGE_FEE, TRANSFER_FEE, SEC_FEE, CONTINGENCY_FEE, OTHER_FEE, BROKERAGE_TRANSFER_FEE, BOND_INTEREST, REPO_EARNINGS, NET_AMOUNT, TRX_TYPE, MARKET, AGENT, SEAT_NUM, AVERAGE_PRICE, EY_SECURITY_CODE, EY_SECURITY_NAME, ACTIVE, STATUS, TRXSETTLEMENT_ID
mapper.update:
update
set FUND_ID = #{FUND_ID}, PERIOD = #{PERIOD}, TRANSACTION_DATE = #{TRANSACTION_DATE}, CURRENCY = #{CURRENCY}, EY_BUYSELL_TYPE = #{EY_BUYSELL_TYPE}, EY_STOCKBOND_TYPE = #{EY_STOCKBOND_TYPE}, STOCK_CODE = #{STOCK_CODE}, STOCK_NAME = #{STOCK_NAME},
QUANTITY = #{QUANTITY},
AMOUNT = #{AMOUNT},
SEAT_COMMISSION = #{SEAT_COMMISSION},
STAMPS = #{STAMPS},
BROKERAGE_FEE = #{BROKERAGE_FEE},
TRANSFER_FEE = #{TRANSFER_FEE},
SEC_FEE = #{SEC_FEE},
CONTINGENCY_FEE = #{CONTINGENCY_FEE},
OTHER_FEE = #{OTHER_FEE},
BROKERAGE_TRANSFER_FEE = #{BROKERAGE_TRANSFER_FEE},
BOND_INTEREST = #{BOND_INTEREST},
REPO_EARNINGS = #{REPO_EARNINGS},
NET_AMOUNT = #{NET_AMOUNT},
TRX_TYPE = #{TRX_TYPE}, MARKET = #{MARKET}, AGENT = #{AGENT}, SEAT_NUM = #{SEAT_NUM},
AVERAGE_PRICE = #{AVERAGE_PRICE},
EY_SECURITY_CODE = #{EY_SECURITY_CODE}, EY_SECURITY_NAME = #{EY_SECURITY_NAME}, ACTIVE = #{ACTIVE}, STATUS = #{STATUS} where TRXSETTLEMENT_ID = #{TRXSETTLEMENT_ID}
mapper.select:
select
from
where 1=1
and (
FUND_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or PERIOD LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or EY_BUYSELL_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or EY_STOCKBOND_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or EY_SECURITY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and PERIOD = #{pd.PERIOD}
